mapper.sql: notice_detail_id, inbound_pre_notice_code, purchase_code, purchase_detail_id, sku_id, sku_name, sku_encode, spec, pre_arrival_quantity, good_quantity, bad_quantity, bad_deal_type, quality_status, quality_time, quality_id, status, createby, create_time, updateby, update_time, batch_code
mapper.update:
update
set inbound_pre_notice_code = #{inbound_pre_notice_code}, purchase_code = #{purchase_code}, purchase_detail_id = #{purchase_detail_id}, sku_id = #{sku_id}, sku_name = #{sku_name}, sku_encode = #{sku_encode}, spec = #{spec}, pre_arrival_quantity = #{pre_arrival_quantity}, bad_deal_type = #{bad_deal_type}, quality_status = #{quality_status}, quality_time = #{quality_time}, quality_id = #{quality_id}, status = #{status}, createby = #{createby}, create_time = #{create_time}, updateby = #{updateby}, update_time = #{update_time}, batch_code = #{batch_code}, notice_detail_id = notice_detail_id where notice_detail_id = #{notice_detail_id}
